title: Build CI/CD Pipeline
subTitle: Automated CI/CD pipeline with Docker and AWS to streamline deployments and reduce errors
overviewContent: Implemented a CI/CD pipeline for multiple systems by containerising them with Docker, automating builds and deployments with GitHub Actions, and deploying seamlessly to AWS Elastic Beanstalk. This setup eliminated manual deployment errors and reduced the time required for releases.

jd: Analysed the existing manual deployment process and implemented an automated CI/CD pipeline using Docker and GitHub Actions, eliminating manual errors and streamlining deployments across all systems.
Built and pushed Docker images to AWS ECR, ensuring consistent environment setup and efficient release process.
Deployed Docker images to AWS Elastic Beanstalk, enabling seamless scaling and improving operational stability.
Optimised the integration between GitHub Actions and AWS services to enhance automation and reduce deployment effort, significantly improving team efficiency.
